effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 551,054.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Hood of Blind Absolution

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

Transmogrified to:
Gloves of Blind Absolution

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 520,505, and grants you up to 9,597 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: The Bashful Book may read an excerpt from an Unpublished Steamy Romance Novel to the target of your spells, dealing 72,682 Arcane damage or 137,669 healing every 2 sec for 20 sec.

If the target dies before the story is finished, the ending will be spoiled for a nearby target, dealing what remains instantly.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Shawl of Blind Absolution

spells.description: Use: Zap yourself for 280,176 Nature damage, gaining 18,595 Intellect for 15 sec. (45 Sec Cooldown)
